titleStmt.title: Commonwealth of Kentucky v. Jesse Underwood and David Underwood, Indictment
CWG1016

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Apprehension of Fugitives from Justice Papers, 1863-1867

body.p:
Bath Circuit Court
The Commonwealth of Kentucky
against } Indictment
Jesse Underwood
David Underwood

The Grand Jury of Bath County in the name and by the authority of the Commonwealth of Kentucky, accuse Jesse Underwood and David Underwood of the offence of Murder, Committed as follows towit The said Jesse Underwood and David Underwood on the 21st day of September 1865 in the County and Circuit aforesaid did wilfully and felloneously and with malace aforethought, shoot, kill and Murder George A Trumbo with a pistol they then and there had loaded with powder and ball
Against the peace and dignity of the Commonwealth of Kentucky

A Copy
Attest V.B. Young C B C C

The Commonwealth
vs } Indictment for Murduer
Jessee Underwood
David Underwood
A True Bill
J. A. Trumbo
Foreman
J. S. Dury Comth atty
